net.jhoogland.jautomata.semirings

Interface Semiring<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the elements of the semiring.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Semifield<K>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanSemiring, KTropicalSemiring, LogSemiring, RealSemiring, TropicalSemiring

    public interface Semiring<K>
    Semirings must implement this interface. A semiring is defined by the methods multiply(x1, x2), add(x1, x2), one() and zero(). The methods isIdempotent(), isCommutative(), and isKClosed(int k) specify properties of the semiring.
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland
